I want all the toys. I hated the designs at first but after seeing them in the film everything looked good. I'd also like a Mikaela aka Megan Fox well I'm at it lol.

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                                  That honestly sucks! The movie is so awesome... and all you can do is
 listen to us saying how insane it is! Only three weeks left, so that
 should go fast.
 
 I can only say that I am SOOO getting the Ironhide toy! Pest control lol!
